phrases: Doing things that bring attention to myself...
That is what I, Yoshikage Kira, hate the most.
And to think that I am experiencing this humiliation in front of total strangers...
To think that the invincible auto-pilot Heart Attack would get caught...
Damn... I have to undo this spell somehow...
Want me to call your mommy?
Hey, hey, hey, did you hear that?
You seeing some sweet dreams during the day after drinking too much, mister?
That is a nice suit you have got on.
We have been fired and do not have any money.
We cannot even get any bitches.
Seeing guys like you piss me off.
At least try to defend yourself.
I will tie them for you.
That is super nice of you!
It turns anything it touches into a bomb.
I just want to live a quiet life,
and yet I had to deal with those two pieces of trash today...
What the heck happened at Centipede Shoes?
I do not really know, but it was not good.
It will take about five minutes.
That means the actual Stand's been damaged, too, right?
Please do not go too far away from me.
We are even more powerful now.
It cannot be helped that my range is shorter than Act 2's.
If you move more than five meters from me,
the weight on that thing will disappear.
It will stop struggling and regain its vigor,
and rush toward us like a dog in heat.
On the other hand, the closer you get to it,
the heavier I can make it.
What would you like to do?
I hope Josuke gets here soon.
Apparently, a gym will be opening near Budogaoka High School soon.
I was really considering getting a membership.
I have to gain more stamina.
But I wonder if I will be lifting the same dumbbells
who have been playing with their dicks after not bathing for a week,
or getting in the same pool with them.
It took me three minutes to get here.
I felt my lack of stamina the most when I tried to cross at the crosswalk.
By the way, who is going to show up here?
You called someone for help, did not you?
Josuke Higashikata and Okuyasu Nijimura live the closest.
It will take them about five minutes, so two minutes to go?
You are their friend, are not you?
who runs Salon Cinderella are also what you call Stand users, are not they?
You would not actually call a lady for help, would you?
I left my jacket with the button behind.
I will go get it later...
After I am done with you.
H-He is... right in front of me!
The one who killed all those people over all those years...
Why does he have two Stands?
I thought a user could only have one Stand!
Heart Attack is a tracer bomb that was launched from Deadly Queen's left hand.
That is why the damage is only in my left hand.
You have just left my range of five meters.
The bomb Stand's weight will disappear.
I will have to attack it with 3 Freeze again.
Who would you like me to hit?
The actual murderer, or that shitty bomb Stand?
3 Freeze cannot make two things heavy at once.
Even if we make the user heavier,
the bomb Stand is on auto-pilot, so it will not stop.
Even if we make the bomb heavier, the user will come after me.
Please hurry and give me orders.
Which one are you going to attack?
It appears that, no matter who you attacked, you were still fated to lose.
However, to think that Heart Attack, which I thought had no weak points,
I had to pay some expenses at the cafe,
then ended up in a scuffle with some hooligans.
I feel like I have been had.
I have ever felt so cornered.
I even feel a slight sense of defeat.
I must show you some respect.
By the way, do you have any pocket tissues?
I have shown you some respect.
The least you can do is talk to me.
A lot of blood is coming from your nose, right?
It is just so you can wipe that off.
I am about to beat you to death.
I have a little over a minute before your friends get here.
Otherwise, I just will not be satisfied after having to face such humiliation in public.
Now, now, stop screaming in such a weird way.
I endured the same pain you feel now
as I was heading over here, but I did not scream.
You are a boy, are not you?
You need some tissues now, do not you?
I will wipe it for you.
They say your brain slows down when your nose is stuffed up.
But you know, I was on the ground a little while ago, too, just like you.
I will blow you away with Deadly Queen in another minute.
Until then, you need to be like me and just endure the pain.
You need to be like me!
Yoshikage Kira is your real name...
When did you take it out of my wallet?
You said you paid some expenses at the cafe earlier, right?
That is when I had an idea.
What do you gain from knowing my name?
You are about to be erased.
Yeah, you are about to kill me.
But even I was able to figure out your name.
You are not that big a deal.
You might get away for now, but how do you feel?
A little brat like me managed to find out what your name was.
A little brat found you out!
I will be looking forward to seeing you in the next world!
What is this sense of defeat?!
I still have a minute before Josuke and Okuyasu show up.
And I was trying to beat the crap out of him to calm myself down.
He is got his socks on inside-out.
But Centipede Shoes is this way.
If we go this way, we will get there in a minute!
And now I can blow you to kingdom come!
The tip of this finger can turn anything into a bomb.
I guess, in your case, I will make your student badge a bomb.
Koichi, you were winning against that man psychologically.
I never thought you would be able to stand with those wounds...
However, you would have been much better off if you had stayed down.
I can almost see the view behind you through your wounds.
But I will break it so you can never see the time on it again...
By that, I mean I will break your face.
You seem like quite an interesting fellow.
I would love to learn your name, as well as various other things,
but I must take my leave.
I only have twenty seconds left.
I do not have time for idle chit-chat.
Your Stand just now was very weak.
I was easily able to catch it, like a pop-up.
Do you really think you can defeat my Deadly Queen with so little power?
Good grief, what an ugly watch.
But you will not have to worry about that anymore...
Because your face is going to end up
It is so fast, it is like it stopped time!
Koichi, if it were not for you, I would have been dead.
You did well fighting all by yourself.
I need to find out if Koichi is alive or not.
If he is alive, I can fix his wounds with Shining Diamond.
Hurry up and fix him, Josuke!
Hey, he is not waking up at all!
But I have already fixed him up.
It is going to take a while for him to regain consciousness.
I have never had such an awful day in my life.
I have always been able to get through any dilemma...
I am going to get away, no matter what.
Hey, do not try anything funny.
Do not go to Centipede Shoes!
There is going to be some crazy explosion!
The owner just suddenly came flying out!
Were you caught in the blast?
I am just an office employee.
But now I am going to die...
I think one of my ribs might have punctured my lung.
H-Hurry up and fix me, please!
No matter how you look at me, I just look like a high school student,
so why would you ask me to fix you?
I have trouble just getting into pachinko parlors,
yet I look like some doctor who graduated from med school to you?
You saw my Shining Diamond, did not you?
Which means you are the enemy.
I guess this means I have lost.
Yes, the one you are all looking for is me.
My face has been seen, my Stand has been seen,
and my name has been discovered.
It appears I will not be able to sleep peacefully anymore...
What the hell are you doing?!
It is so painful, and I am bleeding a lot.
But winning or losing means nothing to me.
I am going to survive in peace.
I have to live with the fate of being unable to fight the urge to kill people,
I leave the rest to you.
What the hell is that wimpy-looking thing?
Josuke, that is a bomb Stand that goes after body heat!
It is going to explode in reaction to your body temperature!
If that guy left it behind...
This is a pretty gross idea, but that hand is heading toward the murderer.
You are not getting away that easily, dumbass!
Now I will be able to sleep peacefully...
Why is your face all bloody?
Is it already time to head home?
I am in a hurry, so I will be seeing you.
The murderer's name is Yoshikage Kira.
His Stand is a short-ranged bomb Stand, Deadly Queen!
Hey, where is that guy headed?
It does not matter where he is headed.
That man is not Yoshikage Kira!
He d-does not have a face!
He is missing his fingerprints on his right hand, too.
He is wearing the same suit...
He brought in that guy, and killed him in front of me.
He made me switch his face using Cinderella.
And his hair and fingerprints, by force...
So he is someone else now?
On the other side of that door!
You are not getting away, damn it!
I-It is time for everyone to go home...
He is not going to be quivering, or hiding.
He is not even going to leave Morioh.
He is going to live his life in this town, like he always has.
Yoshikage Kira Changes His Face, Name, and Address, Becoming a Different Person
Yoshikage Kira changes his face, name, and address, becoming a different person.
Episode 25 Hear t Fa t her
